name: Stompy vs The Monolith
description:
This is a game for the 102 weekly game jam, under the theme "One Big Boss".

Theme: you play as a monolith at the center of a city, trying to provide the right environment for your citizens to work and generate money. Sadly, there is a very tenacious monster (Stompy) that likes walking through and eating your people. So, you are forced to hurt it to protect your humans. You can, if you have somebody to play with, do a versus mode, where Stompy is controlled by a second player.

Controls: mouse for the city control, optionally a player 2 can use keyboard (Qwerty/Azerty) to control the monster. Escape key for pause, Space key for replay.
